metadata.synopsis: Goblin is telling player of the captive they've placed in the wolf pens.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - goto 338.637; 40.904; 23.461OR- teleport  S_GOB_RaiderArrogant- Speak with Sharp-eye Neem

0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Neem
0.text: Don't let our little pet scare ya, mate. Bloody bugbear couldn't break those bars.
0.context: NodeContext: Goblin is relatively friendly, cheerfully advising the player of a prisoner they're treating poorly.

1.speaker: Sharp-Eye Neem
1.text: Headin' t'see our new pet? It didn't tame easy, I'll give it that.
1.context: NodeContext: Goblin is relatively friendly, cheerfully advising the player of a prisoner they're treating poorly.
